_meanings:
{@--1@} Pointing back; a rule
or direction which refers or points
back to a previous rule;  
{#yaTAsaMKyamanudeSaH samAnAM#} <ls>P. I. 3. 10</ls>; subsequent
mention of things (words, suffixes
&c.) in the order of things 
previously mentioned, respective 
enumeration or statement, first for first, 

second for second; as in  
{#samUlAkftajIvezu hankfYgrahaH#} <ls>P. III. 4. 36.</ls>
